Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:vP4Gifu1.name: layer
Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:vP4Gifu1.abstract: Notifies the instance that it needs display.

Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:vP4Gifu1.name: frame
Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:vP4Gifu1.abstract: View frame used for resizing the frames.

Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:vP4Gifu1.name: contentMode
Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:vP4Gifu1.abstract: Content mode used for resizing the frames.

Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:ve4GifuR.name: intrinsicContentSize
Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:ve4GifuR.abstract: Returns the intrinsic content size based on the size of the image.

Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.name: animate(withGIFNamed:loopCount:)
Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.abstract: Prepare for animation and start animating immediately.

Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.name: animate(withGIFData:loopCount:)
Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.abstract: Prepare for animation and start animating immediately.

Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.name: prepareForAnimation(withGIFData:loopCount:completionHandler:)
Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.abstract: Prepare for animation and start animating immediately.

Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.name: prepareForReuse()
Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.abstract: Stop animating and free up GIF data from memory.

Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.name: setShouldResizeFrames(_:)
Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.abstract: Whether the frame images should be resized or not. The default is false, which means that the frame images retain their original size.

Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.name: setFrameBufferCount(_:)
Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.abstract: Sets the number of frames that should be buffered. Default is 50. A high number will result in more memory usage and less CPU load, and vice versa.

Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.name: updateImageIfNeeded()
Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html#/s:FE4GifuP.abstract: Updates the image with a new frame if necessary.

Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html.name: GIFAnimatable
Protocols/GIFAnimatable.html.abstract: The protocol that view classes need to conform to to enable animated GIF support.

Protocols/ImageContainer.html.name: ImageContainer
Protocols/ImageContainer.html.abstract: A single-property protocol that animatable classes can optionally conform to.

Classes/Animator.html#/s:FC4Gifu8Animato.name: init(withDelegate:)
Classes/Animator.html#/s:FC4Gifu8Animato.abstract: Creates a new animator with a delegate.

Classes/GIFImageView.html#/s:FC4Gifu12GI.name: display(_:)
Classes/GIFImageView.html#/s:FC4Gifu12GI.abstract: Layer delegate method called periodically by the layer. Should not be called manually.

Classes/GIFImageView.html.name: GIFImageView
Classes/GIFImageView.html.abstract: Example class that conforms to GIFAnimatable. Uses default values for the animator frame buffer count and resize behavior. You can either use it directly in your code or use it as a blueprint for your own subclass.

Classes/Animator.html.name: Animator
Classes/Animator.html.abstract: Responsible for parsing GIF data and decoding the individual frames.
